Tom Emerson wrote:
> I updated to the latest CVS HEAD, updated to the released JDK 1.5, and
> my crawls are still getting stuck, and jstack is still unable to get a
> decent stack trace.

The released 1.5 still gives the same sort of stack-dump error-stacks?

Your initial report looked like some notification of ready/timed-out
IO was being lost. The stack-dump error-stacks suggest something about
the local lightweight threads implementation is befuddling the
debugger.

What kernel/distro are you using?

- Gordon @ IA
